column1: Local Foods////Banh Mi - You know those $2.50 sandwiches you get at the Vietnamese shops with a thin layer of meat and some veggies? You won't find any skimping on the protein here. Be ready to use a fork and knife with this sandwich because the amount of meat that it comes with is excessive. The sandwich is more meat than anything else and will surely fill up even the most famished college student. Luckily
column2: the meat is well marinated and taste amazing.
